TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. When you first launch, and attempt to dock to the Endurance, you crash into it a pieces destroy a huge area around your house, along with a bunch of Earth.



I wish to be able to teleport.

Granted, but you can't control where and teleport into the vast emptiness of space.

I wish be a clone trooper.

Granted, but youre the redshirt equivalent.

i wish to have a licensed hobbes plush from calvin and hobbes

194508172023

Granted: It is licensed to kill and is hunting you.

I wish that the person who reads this knows where the next sentence is from.

"Hey Rocky, watch me pull a rabbit out of my hat, nothing up my sleeve!"

Granted. I dont know the episode but i know its bullwinkle and rocky. The warp of the wish? Knowing youre old enough to know that cartoon.

i wish to be able to live my truth and not the truth people expect

051408182023

Granted: It only happens when nobody else is around.

(It was said in ever title sequence of Rocky and Bullwinkle, usually Bullwinkle pulls out something like a Rhino or Lion. I like to say the quote with Sylvester Stallone saying the Rocky part.)

I wish I wasn't so sleepy.

(Explains why i couldnt pin it down lol god im old and im not 42 yet lol)

granted, youre asleep.

i wish i was on ISS

055308182023

Granted. You're on the ISS, but exactly when it's getting deorbited. 

I wish to go to a LEGO store (Oddly enough, I've never been to one)

Granted, but they're all sold out of the ones you want.

I wish for breakfast food.

Granted you get chicken-fried steak, mashed potatoes with cream gravy, green beans and a dinner roll. Enjoy dinner not breakfast mwuhahaha

i wish for fun for YOU user below me!

164108182023

Granted: If I have some I will let you know.

I wish for an epic tale.

Granted, you are Grendel.

i wish for you to pick a wish

224308182023

Granted: I will need a barrel with a side door to spin.

I wish for a wish lottery.

Your wish was not granted, you didnt win the “get a lottery” lottery

i wish to have a microscope

225408182023

Granted: But you knocked off the table and can't find it in the carpet.

I wish for a macroscope.

Granted but its too large to use

i wish to swish fwish swoosh

234408182023

Granted: You are the fan bearer for a Sultan.

I wish to see that.

Granted to see a giant THAT

i wish fish could swish a swoosh

234808182023

Edited August 19, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted: But you can't hear them underwater.

I wish for a 4th Hot label.

Granted but you gotta get a user to go add a number

i wish theyd hurry

235808182023

Granted: They curry.

I wish for more posts.

Granted, you get 10,000 500M steel posts in your front yard

i wish tish

000308192023

Granted: You get a Jazz Drummer.

I wish the forum would label this thread.

Granted it gets labeled as a thread

i wish to go wheee

000708192023

Granted: But you can't find a bush in time.

I wish for more speed.
